import React from 'react' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' function Products() { const [product, setproduct] = useState(); useEffect(() => { fetch('https://fakestoreapi.com/products') .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => { setproduct(data) }) }, []) return (
{/*

Products

{product && product.map(item => (item.title))} */}

Vans Sk8-Hi MTE Shoes

Style: VA33TXRJ5

The Vans All-Weather MTE Collection features footwear and apparel designed to withstand the elements whilst still looking cool.

$125
Add to Cart
) } export default Products
